fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Absorb another player each night, removing them from the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players you remove from the game become part of you. They gain access to your private channel and you to theirs. You gain all their abilities, attributes, immunities, stats, etc. except factional ones. They win if you win.
- When you deal attacks, your attack value corresponds to that of the role that gave you the ability to deal that attack.
- If an attribute allows you to use multiple abilities each night, you may instead only use multiple abilities from the role(s) that gave you that attribute each night.
- You may elect at any time to remove any number of your abilities or attributes from other roles, but you will not be able to get them back.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill or absorb all who would oppose you.
